Question
========
You examine whether attending two different sporting events has an effect on one's level of sports practice. You draw a random sample of people who attend a soccer game, who attend an ice skating competition and who **do not **attend a sporting event attend, and measure their physical activity the day after attending the soccer game .  
  
Which statistical model is correct for this situation?

Answerlist
----------
* One-way ANOVA
* Regression with a moderation effect (interaction)
* One-way repeated measures ANOVA
* Mixed-design ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
